I am glad and honoured to join the [editorial board](https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/italian-political-science-review-rivista-italiana-di-scienza-politica/information/about-this-journal/editorial-board) of the Italian Political Science Review as Associate Editor. Looking forward to contributing to the growth of the flagship publication of the Italian political science community together with an incredible team of scholars.
